item.title: How to set up WireGuard on your own Ubuntu 20.04 server
item.description: Introduction WireGuard is a lightweight communication protocol that implements encrypted virtual privacy network (VPN). In my humble opinion, if you are simple user, you should use VPN, because: It gives you more freedom to access the internet safely from your smartphone or laptop when connected to a doubt network, like any public WiFi. You have an access to websites blocked in your country for some reasons.
